en: A potential client emails you about a quick job that should only take you an evening to finish. There's a caveat, though: they want to pay you in exposure.
You finish up the work and send it to the client, only for your name to be buried deep within their website on a credits page no one will ever read. Oh well.
You ignore the email. Your time is worth money. Knowing this gives your self-esteem a boost.
